        <api_name>global.BasicAuth</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implementation for HTTP Basic Authorization</description>
        <name>BasicAuth</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BasicAuth = Class.create();

BasicAuth.prototype = {
   initialize : function(request, response, auth_type, auth_value) {
	  this.request = request;
      this.response = response;
      this.auth_type = auth_type;
      this.auth_value = auth_value;
	    gs.log("Basic auth " + this.auth_type);
//	    gs.warn('trying to get arguments ' + this.request);
   },
   
   getAuthorized : function() {
	   gs.log('--------------------------------- Basic Auth -------------------------')
	  var signature = this.request.getHeader('X-Hub-Signature-256');
	  var result;
	 // gs.warn('caller ' + this.request.inputStream);
	  if (signature != '' && signature != null && signature != undefined){ // verify signature 
		  var cert = signature.split('=')[1];
		  var secret = 'my-secret';
		  gs.log('request' + this.request.getParameterNames());
		  gs.log('login in user through ' + this.auth_type + " auth with signature " + signature);
		  var resultBool = new MyJSUtils().verifySignature(cert, secret, payload);
		  if (resultBool){
			  result = GlideUser.authenticateUser('test.integration2', 'admin');
		  }
		  return result;
	  }
	  else 
	  {
	  var up = GlideStringUtil.base64Decode(this.auth_value);
      var split = up.indexOf(":");
      
      if (split == -1) {
         gs.log("Basic authentication not well formed");
         return null;
      }
      
      // locate user and impersonate
      var userName = up.substring(0, split);
      var password = up.substring(split + 1);
	  result = GlideUser.authenticateUser(userName, password);
      
      if (!result) {
         gs.log("Basic authentication failed for user: " + userName);
         return null;
      }}
      
      // user is authenticated, so return it...
      return result;
	   }
	   
	  

}]]></script>
